Essitys vd: “Kunderna vill att vi ska hjälpa dem att bli mer hållbara”
Att jobba med hållbarhet gör bolag mer effektiva – vilket ger en vinst på kort sikt. Men på längre sikt blir bolaget mer relevanta och mer attraktiva, säger Essitys vd Magnus Groth. Hans bolag presterade bäst av alla dagligvaruklassen i Hållbara Bolag 2019.
04 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Jon Röhne

Essity's CEO: “Customers want us to help them become more sustainable”
Working with sustainability makes companies more efficient - resulting in short-term profits. But in the longer term, the company becomes more relevant and more attractive, says Essity's CEO Magnus Groth. His company performed best of all the grocery class in Sustainable Companies 2019.
04 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Jon Röhne
